#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int get_gcd(int a, int b)
{
    if(b == 0)
        return a;
    return get_gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
   int t,n,m;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
       scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
       if(n == 1)
        printf("%d\n",m);
       else if(m == 1)
        printf("%d\n",n);
       else if(n == m)
        printf("%d\n",n);
       else
        {
            int a = n-1, b = m-1;
            int gcd = get_gcd(a,b);
            //printf("%d\n",gcd);
            int p = a/gcd;
            int q = b/gcd;
            int i=0,cnt=0;
            while(1)
            {
                if(p*i<=a && q*i<=b)
                {
                    cnt++;
                    i++;
                }
                else
                    break;
            }
            printf("%d\n",cnt);
        }
   }
   return 0;

}
